text: "Too Hot" is a song by American singer Jason Derulo. It was released as a single on August 27, 2019, by Warner Records. The song was written by Andrew Morris, Everton Bonner, Ian Devaney, Jacob Manson, Jason Desrouleaux, John Taylor, Lisa Stansfield, Lloyd Willis and Sly Dunbar. ==Music video== A music video to accompany the release of "Too Hot" was first released onto YouTube on September 3, 2019.
